tool_description: Monitors real-time status, performance metrics, and health indicators of active geofence campaigns with alert capabilities.

campaign_ids.description: Array of campaign IDs to monitor

error_messages: Invalid campaign_ids: One or more campaign IDs do not exist or are invalid
Too many campaigns: Maximum 20 campaigns can be monitored in a single request
Access denied: You do not have permission to monitor one or more campaigns
usage: Provide an array of campaign_ids to monitor. Set include_metrics to true for detailed performance data. The tool returns current status and key metrics for each campaign.

campaign_statuses.description: Current status of each monitored campaign

total_impressions.description: Total impressions across all monitored campaigns

total_clicks.description: Total clicks across all monitored campaigns

total_spend.description: Total spend in USD across all campaigns

alerts.description: Any alerts or warnings for the monitored campaigns

last_updated.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of last data update
